items.name: BOTTOM
desc: displays the chart legend beneath the diagram.
The second entry in the legend is placed on the right hand side of the first one.

items.name: LEFT
desc: displays the chart legend on the left side of the diagram.
The second entry in the legend is placed below the first one.

items.name: NONE
desc: To disable the legend you should set the property ChartDocument.HasLegend to FALSE instead of setting this value.

items.name: RIGHT
desc: displays the chart legend on the right side of the diagram.
The second entry in the legend is placed below the first one.

items.name: TOP
desc: displays the chart legend above the diagram.
The second entry in the legend is placed on the right hand side of the first one.
